faqs.question: What is your return policy?
faqs.answer: Our return policy allows you to return items within 30 days of purchase.

faqs.question: How do I track my order?
faqs.answer: You can track your order using the tracking link sent to your email.

faqs.question: Do you offer international shipping?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer international shipping to many countries.

faqs.question: How can I contact customer support?
faqs.answer: You can contact customer support via email at support@example.com.

faqs.question: What payment methods do you accept?
faqs.answer: We accept all major credit cards, PayPal, and Apple Pay.

greetings.question: hello
greetings.answer: Hello! How can I help you today?

greetings.question: hi
greetings.answer: Hi there! What can I do for you?

greetings.question: hey
greetings.answer: Hey! How can I assist you?
